title: Doombots
body:
Yes. I want this game mode back. Intense. Fun. Helpful.

When will this game mode be coming back, this game mode needs to be relaunched and shown to the new comers to League. For they will need to know the experience of how it feels.

I'm hoping they'll release this next Halloween. Hahaha

Edit: Lemme throw in a Video :D

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i7YGtxF1iGU
